name: Late for Halloween
description:
Its almost time for Halloween and YOU'RE ALMOST LATE!

In this game, you play as Octarine, a novice witch chasing the clock flying on her broomstick to make it in time for their coven's ritual. Help her face obstacles along the way as she glides through a path full of bats and jack-o-lanterns! 

Will you make it in time for Halloween? How far can you go? Find out! 

Late for Halloween is a scrolling game inspired by the Google Offline Dinosaur Game. You play the game by simply pressing up/spacebar and down to make her jump and duck from incoming obstacles and see how far you can help Octarine without killing her.

|CREDITS| 
art by Simplewd Games
music by Juhani Junkala
beta-test/writer: EriBloodberry
